job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
We’re hiring for a rapidly growing series A startup, who are developing an autonomous vehicle using “shared autonomy”. The company’s platform combines robotics, computer vision and machine learning and it’s here to revolutionize their $12 billion market.


They’re looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to design and deliver their new autonomous vehicle.


If you are passionate about cutting edge machine learning, robotics and having real-world impact – this could be the place for you!


You will:

  • Design and train neural networks
  • Design, train and verify robust machine learning systems
  • Provide technical leadership
  • Write maintainable code, design software and deploy machine learning models
  • Collaborate with other members of the team


You have:

  • PhD or Master’s degree in Computer Science or related field
  • Experience in reinforcement learning, machine learning or optimization theory
  • 3+ years of hands-on experience
  • Expertise with deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, Tensorflow, Keras)
  • Experience developing machine learning systems
  • Expertise in Python and C++
  • Excellent communication skills



Big Cloud is acting as a vendor to this position which is a direct hire.
